activities: Communique Kaleidoscope, Inc. (DBA CommKal Hosting Solutions) is a provider of Internet Services, website hosting, and related services. Personal Data is collected from clients through business relationships. Our collected data, which passes through our security devices such as firewalls, is protected by encryption and other industry standard measures. Our clients may collect personal data through their websites that physically reside on our servers, but the protection of privacy of this collected data is the responsibility of our clients.
